alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 2:23PM EST until January 16 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 expected. * WHERE...In Florida, Inland St. Johns, Inland Flagler and Coastal Nassau Counties. In Georgia, Coastal Glynn and Coastal Camden Counties. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nassau; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
